title: Maggie Throup – 2022 Comments on Rishi Sunak Becoming Prime Minister
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Maggie Throup, the Conservative MP for Erewash, on Twitter on 20 October 2022.
content:
I’m backing Rishi Sunak for PM. I know he’ll unite the party as well as bringing sound economics to our country and lead us to success in the future.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector
  *[CEOs]: chief executive officers
  *[OECD]: Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development
